name: Gods of Malay
description:
In this game, your aim is to appease 10 different Gods and your own people. Within the game, you can say yes or no to different requests, and check how your response affects people's and the God's opinions by clicking the pink-red arrow on the left side of the screen.

Make sure nobodies opinions get below zero, otherwise you'll lose!

Made for the Trijam 212!
